name: radiantly
content:
Add to word list

in a way that is obviously very happy, very beautiful, or very attractive: smile radiantly In a recent photo, she is smiling radiantly.radiantly beautiful She is a radiantly beautiful young woman.
More examplesFewer examplesShe seemed so radiantly happy when we met up last week.The story starts with the arrival of a radiantly charismatic young school teacher.It's the only time in our interview that she looks anything other than radiantly confident.There has never been a more radiantly lyrical performance of this work.
